publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2725 Mike Watson: Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Football Association and Glasgow City Council on securing the UEFA Cup final which will take place at the National Stadium, Hampden Park, in May 2007; notes that this follows the outstanding success of the UEFA Champions League final, held at the same venue in 2002, which generated £25 million for the economy of Greater Glasgow; recognises Glasgow’s status as an internationally renowned city and home for major international sporting events, and looks forward to the city hosting further events in the future, such as the Commonwealth Games.

S2M-2725 Mike Watson: Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Football Association and Glasgow City Council on securing the UEFA Cup final which will take place at the National Stadium, Hampden Park, in May 2007; notes that this follows the outstanding success of the UEFA Champions League final, held at the same venue in 2002, which generated £25 million for the economy of Greater Glasgow; recognises Glasgow’s status as an internationally renowned city and home for major international sporting events, and looks forward to the city hosting further events in the future, such as the Commonwealth Games.
S2M-2725 Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final (lodged on 21 April 2005) Michael McMahon*

S2M-2725 Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final (lodged on 21 April 2005) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Elaine Smith*, Michael Matheson*, Bristow Muldoon*, Robert Brown*, Alex Fergusson*, Rosie Kane*, Christine May*, Paul Martin*, Colin Fox*, Janis Hughes*, Alex Neil*, Margaret Jamieson*, Bill Butler*, Brian Adam*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Bill Aitken*, Donald Gorrie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Pauline McNeill*
S2M-2725 Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final (lodged on 21 April 2005) Phil Gallie*, Mike Pringle*, Cathie Craigie*, Jackie Baillie*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-2725 Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final (lodged on 21 April 2005) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Trish Godman*
S2M-2725 Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final (lodged on 21 April 2005) Scott Barrie*
S2M-2725 Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final (lodged on 21 April 2005) Dennis Canavan*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2725 Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final (lodged on 21 April 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2725 Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final (lodged on 21 April 2005) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-2725 Glasgow to Host the 2007 UEFA Cup Final (lodged on 21 April 2005) Dr Jean Turner*
